argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_addcom | |- ( ( M e. CC /\ N e. CC ) -> ( M + N ) = ( N + M ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( M + N ) = ( N + M ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( M + N ) = ( N + M ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift ( M + N ) ) = ( W cyclShift ( N + M ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_2cshw | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) = ( W cyclShift ( M + N ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3com23 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) = ( W cyclShift ( M + N ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_2cshw | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) cyclShift M ) = ( W cyclShift ( N + M ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 8, 9 | #P_3eqtr4rd | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) cyclShift M ) = ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) ) |
